tasks.title: Implement Board Templates
tasks.description: Develop a set of predefined templates for boards to facilitate quicker setup for new users, catering to various use cases like project management, event planning, or daily chores.

tasks.title: Advanced Search Functionality
tasks.description: Enhance the search functionality to include filters and advanced query capabilities, allowing users to search by tags, due dates, attachments, and specific words within card descriptions.

tasks.title: Customizable Dashboard
tasks.description: Introduce a customizable dashboard where users can view and manage multiple boards at once. Include widgets for quick overviews of task progress, upcoming deadlines, and personal metrics.

tasks.title: Integration with Third-Party Tools
tasks.description: Plan for the integration of third-party tools such as Slack, Google Calendar, and GitHub, allowing users to sync their boards with these platforms for enhanced productivity.

tasks.title: Offline Mode
tasks.description: Develop an offline mode that allows users to view and edit their boards without an internet connection. Changes should sync automatically once the connection is restored.

tasks.title: User Activity Logs
tasks.description: Create detailed logs of user activity on each board, allowing board administrators to track changes made by team members, including time-stamped edits and deletions.

tasks.title: Enhanced Mobile Experience
tasks.description: Optimize the mobile app experience to ensure full feature parity with the desktop version, including drag-and-drop support and real-time notifications.

tasks.title: Setup Development Environment
tasks.description: Prepare the local and shared development environments with all necessary tools and libraries for frontend development.

todos.title: Install Node.js and npm or yarn for package management.
Choose a JavaScript framework/library (React recommended) and set it up.
Configure Babel for JavaScript transpilation.
Set up Webpack for module bundling, or use Create React App for simplicity.
Install essential libraries (e.g., React Router for routing, Axios for HTTP requests).
Configure ESLint and Prettier for code linting and formatting consistency.

tasks.title: Component Design and Implementation
tasks.description: Design and develop reusable frontend components that match the app's design specifications and UX requirements.

todos.title: Design the UI components using a tool like Figma or Adobe XD based on wireframes.
Implement core components such as Boards, Lists, Cards, Menus, Modals, and Tooltips.
Use React Hooks for state and lifecycle management in functional components.
Ensure components are modular and reusable across the application.
Apply responsive design principles to all components for mobile and desktop compatibility.

tasks.title: Styling and Theming
tasks.description: Create a cohesive style and theming system that can be easily modified and extended, using CSS or a CSS-in-JS solution like styled-components.

todos.title: Define a global style guide including color palette, typography, and spacing.
Implement the style guide using CSS variables or a theming context in React.
Create dark and light theme support.
Ensure that all UI components adhere to the defined themes and update dynamically when changes are made.

tasks.title: Users Management
tasks.description:
System Activities

  • Capture IP-Address for tracking

  • Another activity

Input Fields

  • Account type (Admin , Editor , Owner, & Guest)

  • Name

  • Email

  • Password

Rules

  • Email must be a valid email format

  • Password must be alphanumeric, min of 8

Other Information

  • Sample cities: (Lagos / Ikeja / Lekki)

  • The password input should be centered and disabled

todos.title: Document endpoint on postman
Create form to register a new user
Implement endpoint to register new user
Implement endpoint to register new user
Implement functionality to register a new user

tasks.title: Frontend Routing
tasks.description: Set up client-side routing to manage navigation between different views and states within the application.

todos.title: Implement React Router for handling routes.
Define routes for core pages like Home, Board View, User Settings, etc.
Ensure routes are protected where necessary (e.g., require authentication).
Handle 404 errors with a custom "Page Not Found" view.
Optimize route transitions and animations for a smooth user experience.

tasks.title: Real-Time Updates
tasks.description: Incorporate real-time functionalities to allow users to see updates across boards without needing to refresh the page.

todos.title: Choose a real-time communication technology (WebSocket is recommended).
Set up a WebSocket server or use a service like Pusher for managing real-time updates.
Integrate WebSocket communications into the frontend.
Ensure that changes in one part of the system (like adding a card) are immediately visible on all connected clients.
Test real-time performance and handle reconnections gracefully.

tasks.title: API Design and Documentation
tasks.description: Design RESTful API endpoints and create comprehensive documentation to guide developers and facilitate future integrations.

todos.title: Define endpoints for boards, lists, cards, users.
Establish request/response formats.
Setup API authentication and authorization strategies.
Document API endpoints using Swagger or a similar tool.
Backend Architect
Technical Writer

tasks.title: API Development - Boards
tasks.description: Implement the API functionality for managing boards.

todos.title: Develop CRUD operations for boards.
Implement board-specific business logic (e.g., permissions, sharing).
Set up unit tests for board operations.

tasks.title: API Development - Lists
tasks.description: Develop the APIs required for handling list operations within boards

todos.title: Implement CRUD operations for lists.

checklists.title: Ensure lists maintain their order within a board.
Create unit tests for list functionalities.

tasks.title: API Development - Cards
tasks.description: Create and implement the API endpoints needed for card manipulation and management.

todos.title: Develop CRUD operations for cards.
Handle card-specific functionalities like comments, attachments, deadlines.
Write unit tests for all card operations.

tasks.title: API Development - Users and Authentication
tasks.description: Set up APIs for user management and authentication to ensure secure access to the Twello.

todos.title: Develop user registration and login endpoints.
Implement JWT-based authentication.
Create API endpoints for user profile management.
Develop security measures for user data protection.
Prepare unit and integration tests for authentication flows.

tasks.title: Frontend - Implement DnD for Cards
tasks.description:
This card outlines the task of implementing robust drag-and-drop functionality within our Twello application. The drag-and-drop feature will enhance the user experience by allowing easy manipulation of items within boards, lists, and cards, mimicking the intuitive interactions found in the original Trello.

 

Objectives:

  1. Implement a seamless drag-and-drop interface for board elements (cards, lists).
  2. Ensure compatibility and responsiveness across all platforms and devices.
  3. Optimize the performance to handle real-time updates with minimal lag.
  4. Integrate drag-and-drop for additional elements like attachments and labels.

todos.title: Research best practices and libraries for drag-and-drop functionality.
Design a high-level architecture that supports DnD within the existing framework.
Implement DnD for moving cards within and between lists.
Enable DnD for reordering lists within a board.
Create smooth animations and visual feedback for DnD actions.
Ensure that DnD features are accessible, including keyboard navigation options.
Test responsiveness and functionality on mobile devices.
Design fallback mechanisms for browsers that do not support HTML5 DnD.
Conduct unit tests for the drag-and-drop functionality.
Perform cross-browser testing to ensure compatibility.
Optimize performance to reduce drag delay and improve user interaction.
Set up user acceptance testing to gather feedback on the DnD feature.
Update developer documentation with DnD integration details.
Create user guides and tutorial videos on how to use the drag-and-drop features.
Train support staff on troubleshooting common issues with drag-and-drop.

tasks.title: Responsive UI Design
tasks.description: Design user interfaces that adapt seamlessly to different screen sizes and orientations, ensuring a consistent and optimal user experience across devices.

todos.title: Analyze current UI and identify elements needing responsiveness improvement.
Create wireframes for key components at different breakpoints (small, medium, large screens).
Design flexible grids and layouts that adjust smoothly to screen changes.
Implement scalable vector graphics (SVGs) for icons and images.
Test responsive designs on various devices and adjust as needed.

tasks.title: CSS Media Queries
tasks.description: Utilize CSS media queries to apply different styling rules based on device characteristics like width, height, and orientation.

todos.title: Define breakpoints for mobile, tablet, and desktop views.
Write CSS rules for each breakpoint to adjust layout, font sizes, and navigation elements.
Ensure interactive elements like buttons and links are touch-friendly.
Optimize form elements for easy input on touch devices.
Continuously test and refine CSS changes on real devices and emulators.

tasks.title: Touch Optimizations
tasks.description: Enhance the web application’s interactivity by optimizing for touch gestures commonly used on mobile devices.

todos.title: Implement touch-friendly drag-and-drop features using libraries like Touch Punch or similar.
Optimize scrolling and swiping actions for performance and smoothness.
Adjust hover effects to work as touch events on mobile devices.
Ensure menus and dropdowns are easy to navigate using touch.
Test all touch interactions for responsiveness and intuitiveness.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Ensure that the mobile version of the web app performs well under various network conditions and on devices with limited resources.

todos.title: Optimize images and assets for fast loading times.
Implement lazy loading for media and offscreen content.
Minify CSS and JavaScript files to reduce load times.
Use caching strategies to enhance performance.
est and analyze performance using tools like Google Lighthouse.

tasks.title: Accessibility on Mobile
tasks.description: Make sure that the web app is accessible on mobile devices for users with disabilities.

todos.title: Ensure all interactive elements are accessible via screen readers.
Test color contrasts for readability on smaller screens.
Make sure all media has appropriate alt text and transcripts.
Provide keyboard navigations and voice commands where feasible.
Conduct usability testing with participants having diverse abilities.

tasks.title: Login Page Error on Mobile
tasks.description:
Mobile users experience a '404 Not Found' error when attempting to access the login page through the footer link.

Steps to Reproduce:

  1. Open the app on a mobile device.
  2. Scroll to the footer and click on the 'Login' link.
  3. The 404 error page is displayed.

Expected Behavior: The login page should load without issues on mobile devices.

Actual Behavior: The page shows a 404 error, indicating the link might be broken or misdirected.

tasks.title: Email Notification Delay
tasks.description:
Users have reported significant delays in receiving email notifications related to board updates.

 

Steps to Reproduce:

  1. Make changes to a board (like adding a new card).
  2. Observe the time taken to receive an email notification.

Expected Behavior: Email notifications should be received within a few minutes of the board update.

 

Actual Behavior: Notifications are taking up to an hour to arrive.

tasks.title: Memory Leak on Board Page
tasks.description:
There is a significant memory leak detected when users keep the board page open for extended periods.

Steps to Reproduce:

  1. Open any board and leave it open for more than 30 minutes.
  2. Monitor the browser's memory usage over time.

Expected Behavior: Memory usage should remain stable over time.

Actual Behavior: Memory usage continuously increases, indicating a possible memory leak.

tasks.title: Database Optimization for Faster Query Performance
tasks.description: Improved the database schema and added indices to crucial tables, which significantly reduced the query times and enhanced the overall performance of the application.

todos.title: Analyzed current database queries and identified bottlenecks.
Implemented indexing on the users, boards, and cards tables.
Refactored some of the complex queries to simpler forms for better efficiency.
Conducted stress testing to ensure stability under load.

tasks.title: User Interface Redesign for Board Page
tasks.description: Redesigned the board page to improve usability and aesthetics. The new design is more intuitive and aligns with modern UI/UX practices.

todos.title: Gathered user feedback on the previous design.
Created wireframes and mockups for the new design.
Implemented the new front-end design.
Conducted user testing and collected feedback.

tasks.title: Integration of Email Notification System
tasks.description: Successfully integrated an email notification system that alerts users about updates to their boards, such as new tasks added or existing tasks updated.

todos.title: Set up an SMTP server for outgoing emails.
Developed email templates for various notifications.
Implemented logic for triggering emails based on user actions.
Tested email deliverability and responsiveness.
